songs.title: ONE & ONLY
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
You're my one and only lady
Got me thinkin' 'bout a baby
Get that Porsche or a Mercedes
You get whatever, girl
You're my one and only lady
Got me thinkin' 'bout a baby
Get that Porsche or a Mercedes
You get whatever, girl

[Verse 1]
Girl, you know you get whatever that your heart desire (whatever)
Never met a girl that picked me up inside (never)
Got me pullin' out the trash, youngin' on my mind
Visitin' the Islands in the summertime (in the summer)
I might consider marriage, put a ring on it
'Til then, baby,  let me put some bling on it
I promise I'll treat you the way you should
Nice cars, fat crib, girl, we livin' good

[Chorus]
You're my one and only lady
Got me thinkin' 'bout a baby
Get that Porsche or a Mercedes
You get whatever, girl
You're my one and only lady
Got me thinkin' 'bout a baby
Get that Porsche or a Mercedes
You get whatever, girl

[Post-Chorus]
Whatever, girl
You get whatever, girl
You can get whatever, girl
Whatever, girl

[Verse 2]
I know you begged me to stay home
'Cause when it's time for the season I stay gone
I gotta keep her with something to hang on
Just know I Don't Want to Leave you like Trey Songz
Put your feet on my lap and let me massage that
Girl, I bring you e'rywhere the squad at (the squad)
It's magic everywhere we makin' contact
Let's focus on us and never get sidetracked

[Chorus]
You're my one and only lady
Got me thinkin' 'bout a baby
Get that Porsche or a Mercedes
You get whatever, girl
You're my one and only lady
Got me thinkin' 'bout a baby
Get that Porsche or a Mercedes
You get whatever, girl

[Post-Chorus]
Whatever, girl
You get whatever, girl
You can get whatever, girl
Whatever, girl

[Chorus]
You're my one and only lady
Got me thinkin' 'bout a baby
Get that Porsche or a Mercedes
You get whatever, girl
You're my one and only lady
Got me thinkin' 'bout a baby
Get that Porsche or a Mercedes
You get whatever, girl
